con:soapui-project.name: Loginbuddy-with-Demo
con:soapui-project.con:description: These tests are testing the actual APIs that are available with a 'naked' loginbuddy container

con:config.name: http-index.html
con:config.con:description: Only https must work, not http

con:config.con:description: Only https must work, not http

con:config.con:description: Only https must work, not http

con:config.con:description: Only https must work, not http

con:config.con:description: Http must work

con:config.name: http-images
con:config.con:description: Http must work

con:config.name: http-favicon
con:config.con:description: Http must work
